document_title: Security update for the Linux Kernel

document_notes.text: Security update for the Linux Kernel
document_notes.title: Topic

document_notes.text:
The SUSE Linux Enterprise 12 SP2 kernel was updated to 4.4.74 to receive
the following security update:

- CVE-2017-7533: Bug in inotify code allowed privilege escalation (bnc#1049483).
document_notes.title: Details

notes.text: Race condition in the fsnotify implementation in the Linux kernel through 4.12.4 allows local users to gain privileges or cause a denial of service (memory corruption) via a crafted application that leverages simultaneous execution of the inotify_handle_event and vfs_rename functions.
